students.description: Tools for managing student records in the school system via REST API endpoints.

create.description: Create a new student record in the system using the provided details.

get.description: Fetch details of a specific student using their unique student ID.

update.description: Update an existing student's information, such as name, email, phone, grade or fee payment status.

delete.description: Remove a student record permanently using their ID.

list.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all students. Useful for browsing records.

fee_due.description: Get a list of all students who have pending fee payments (fee due = yes).

unpaid.description: List all students who have not paid any fees (fee_paid = 0 or false).

partial_paid.description: List students who have paid part of their fees, but not the full amount.

fullpaid.description: List students who have paid all their fees.

by_grade.description: Retrieve all students belonging to a specific grade/class.

teachers.description: Tools for managing teacher records via REST API.

create.description: Create a new teacher record with personal and professional details.

get.description: Fetch details of a teacher using their unique teacher ID.

update.description: Update a teacher's profile including name, contact details, subject, or salary.

delete.description: Delete a teacher's record from the system using their ID.

list.description: Retrieve a paginated list of teachers. Useful for browsing or admin panels.

by_salary.description: Fetch teachers filtered by salary comparison. 'op' is a comparison operator like gte, lte; 'amount' is salary value.

by_grade.description: List all teachers associated with teaching a specific grade/class.
